tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE texts (text_id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_id INT, text_content TEXT, language_code VARCHAR(5))
CREATE TABLE sources (source_id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_name VARCHAR(50), source_type VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE language_models (model_id INT PRIMARY KEY, model_name VARCHAR(50), model_type VARCHAR(50), model_accuracy FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE model_training (
    training_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    text_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES texts(text_id)
);
